Sure, here is the updated shorter version of the cover letter for the job requirement you provided:

Dear Hiring Manager,

I am excited to apply for the appointment setter position for mortgage protection. My 7 years of experience in call centers, strong communication skills, and ability to understand customer needs will allow me to excel in this role. I am a quick learner and efficient in internet research, able to adapt to new technologies and platforms. I am confident that I can help your company achieve its goals and bring in new business.

Please find my Voice demo as an attachment.

Thank you for your consideration. I look forward to discussing how I can contribute to your team.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]

This version of the cover letter is short and concise, it emphasizes your relevant experience, skills and the most important information for the job. It also includes the information that you have attached a voice demo that can give the hiring manager a better idea of your voice and communication skills.
